thread.title: New York Philharmonic to Get Advance Look at Its Next Music Director
thread.title_full: New York Philharmonic to Get Advance Look at Its Next Music Director - WSJ

author: Charles Passy
title: New York Philharmonic to Get Advance Look at Its Next Music Director
text:
New York Philharmonic Music Director Designate Jaap van Zweden will lead the ensemble in three weeks of programs during its 2017-18 season, highlighting works by a range of composers, orchestra officials announced Wednesday.
Mr. Van Zweden will take over as music director in 2018-19, but the Philharmonic said his concerts next season could be considered a “glimpse” into the musical approach he will take.
The Dutch-born...
